pr_title: Remove misc dependency related deprecation warnings

timeline.bodyText: This is not required anymore as we 1) now compile by default against the plain compiled classes folders (since we use java-library plugin now) and 2) the runtime config should use the proper shadowjar
timeline.author: breskeby

replies.bodyText: This might have implications on the generated POM file as well. I'd confirm that it looks the same before/after this change.
replies.author: mark-vieira
